Job Posting:173895 - Position: W26 Software Development & AI Intern (Co-op) 173895B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Winter App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 10/03/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 09/26/2025 05:01 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country Harris Computer Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode 2026 - Winter W26 Software Development & AI Intern (Co-op) 173895B Co-op Position Various Locations Canada 8 months To be confirmed Salary Currency CAD Salary Job Description ID: R0032206 30.0 per hour for 0 Major List Location: British Columbia, Canada, or Remote - Ontario, Saskatchewan, Quebec, Alberta, Manitoba Are you a passionate and innovative student eager to dive into the cutting edge of software development and artificial intelligence? Join our dynamic team as a Software Development & AI Intern and contribute to real-world projects that shape the future of our products! This isn't just an internship; it's an opportunity to make a tangible impact, expand your technical toolkit, and gain invaluable industry experience working alongside seasoned professionals. About the Role: We're looking for bright, curious minds to join our R&D and development teams. You'll be at the heart of our innovation, contributing to exciting AI and software development initiatives from concept to deployment. This role offers a unique blend of hands-on coding, UI/UX design, and strategic collaboration, providing broad exposure to our leadership and cross-functional teams. We're seeking candidates available for a minimum 6-month work term, with options for part-time or full-time engagement. What You'll Do & Learn: • Innovate & Build: Actively contribute to the design, development, and testing of prototypes for new software features and products, including our AI-driven solutions. • Full-Stack Exposure: Work on various stages of the product lifecycle, from initial concept and design iterations to development, testing, and deployment. • Shape User Experience: Collaborate closely with our development team to translate strategic goals into modern, intuitive, and user-friendly software experiences, applying best practices in responsive design, accessibility, and performance optimization. • Collaborate & Communicate: Partner with cross-functional teams, including R&D and AI strategy, to understand requirements, present your design ideas, and ensure seamless technical integration. • Problem Solve: Participate in regular team meetings, present your findings, and contribute to ongoing research projects, helping to identify and implement solutions that elevate product quality and capability. • Grow Your Skills: Expand your expertise in UI/UX principles, modern development methodologies, and emerging technologies within a supportive and feedback-rich environment. Salary: 30$/hr Ready to Innovate? If you're ready to challenge yourself, contribute to groundbreaking projects, and accelerate your career in a supportive and innovative environment, we encourage you to apply! Join us and help build the future. Job Requirements Who You Are: • Currently pursuing or recently completed a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a closely related technical field. Demonstrated passion for research, innovation, and software development. • • Familiarity with core software development tools and methodologies. • A proactive learner with strong problem-solving abilities and a collaborative spirit. • A team player; this is an opportunity to learn from and engage with your colleague and team members. We have camera on meetings and encourage and expect participation, even if it is asking questions to learn more. What Will Make You Stand Out (Bonus Points!): • Technical Toolkit: Experience with any of the following: Python, JavaScript, SQL, HTML, CSS, Docker, PostgreSQL, OpenSearch, RabbitMQ. • Design Savvy: A keen eye for UI/UX design, layout, typography, and visual storytelling, with an understanding of how design impacts brand perception and user experience. • Project Experience: Previous co-op, hackathon, personal projects, or open-source contributions that showcase your initiative and technical skills. • AI Enthusiasm: A strong interest in Artificial Intelligence and emerging technologies. • Proactive Voice: Eagerness to share ideas, ask questions, and contribute meaningfully to discussions and design iterations. • Experience working with design systems or brand guidelines. • Time Zone: PST Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://harriscomputer.wd3.myworkdayjobs.com/en-US/1/job/British-Columbia-Canada/Software-Development--- AI-Intern--Co-op-_R0032206 Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
